label: Library Buildings
description: Studies the library's physical plant in the light of changing concepts and patterns of library service; analyzes present-day library buildings (both new and remodeled), and their comparison with each other as well as with buildings of the past; examines the interrelationship of staff, collections, users, and physical plant; discussion supplemented by visits to new libraries and conference with their staffs. A two-day field trip is required. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Library & Information Science major(s).
